Name: Fire
Description: Beezer always has the most warm, comforting fire in his house.

Name: Lab
Description: This messy room has all sorts of odd unfinished projects that Beezer has. Something tells me that it's in my best interest not to know what he's doing.

Name: Shelf
Description: This bookshelf is full of some of what looks to be by far the most technical books I have ever seen. It just goes to show what a brilliant mind Beezer really has.
